name: Lizard Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Explore plains and forests being a real gecko lizard with our animal survival simulator! Fight for your life against cruel predators, create your own lizard family and have fun with Lizard Survival Simulator 3D!
Become a real adult gecko lizard and find your mate to make a family and raise your little nestlings! Enjoy the views of wild tropical forest, find food to fill your little stomach and do your best to survive and continue the gecko line! Fight for your life against every cruel predator, which is able to damage you and your little family! Even the little lizard like you may become your direct rival!
Protect your nest from such enemies as frog, rabbit or even cruel reptile and Komodo Dragon! They can suddenly attack you and you should furiously defend! Don’t forget to mind your health, energy and food indicators if one of them drops, you could find your nest destroyed and family killed! Earn points and level up skills, learn various attacks and change your skin color! Customize your gecko lizard to look like a Sind Gecko, yellow-throated day gecko or even rainbow agama with Lizard Survival Simulator 3D!
Discover this colorful world of gecko lizards, hunt tasty ants, battle against cruel insectivores and do your best to survive! Mate with other lizards, raise little nestlings, fight for your life and have fun!
Lizard Survival Simulator 3D features:
• Realistic gecko lizard survival simulator
• Opportunity to mate and raise nestlings
• Full customization of gecko lizard
• Great amount of various rivals
• Simple and intuitive controls
• Wonderful 3D graphics
Be a real gecko lizard, explore the land, survive and raise nestlings with Lizard Survival Simulator 3D!
